Calculate m³ modulo 9:
  • If m ≡ 0 (mod 9), then m³ ≡ 0³ = 0 (mod 9).
  • If m ≡ 1 (mod 9), then m³ ≡ 1³ = 1 (mod 9).
  • If m ≡ 2 (mod 9), then m³ ≡ 8 (mod 9) [since 2³ = 8].
  • If m ≡ 3 (mod 9), then m³ ≡ 27 ≡ 0 (mod 9).
  • If m ≡ 4 (mod 9), then m³ ≡ 64, and 64 mod 9 = 64 − 63 = 1.
  • If m ≡ 5 (mod 9), then m³ ≡ 125. Since 9×13 = 117, 125 − 117 = 8.
  • If m ≡ 6 (mod 9), then m³ ≡ 216 ≡ 0 (mod 9) (because 9×24 = 216).
  • If m ≡ 7 (mod 9), then m³ ≡ 343. Since 9×38 = 342, 343 − 342 = 1.
  • If m ≡ 8 (mod 9), then m³ ≡ 512. Since 9×56 = 504, 512 − 504 = 8.

   Take n = 1: 3(1)² + 3(1) + 7 = 3 + 3 + 7 = 13.
   13 mod 9 = 4.
